analysis.description:
RBAC.roles (/unique_chucks/2/0x9ede87077078aee6eaaa96cbee47726a85c7c161.sol#194-195) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- checkRole (/unique_chucks/2/0x9ede87077078aee6eaaa96cbee47726a85c7c161.sol#209-214)
	- hasRole (/unique_chucks/2/0x9ede87077078aee6eaaa96cbee47726a85c7c161.sol#223-228)
	- addRole (/unique_chucks/2/0x9ede87077078aee6eaaa96cbee47726a85c7c161.sol#235-240)
	- removeRole (/unique_chucks/2/0x9ede87077078aee6eaaa96cbee47726a85c7c161.sol#246-256)

TokenTimelock.constructor (/unique_chucks/2/0x9ede87077078aee6eaaa96cbee47726a85c7c161.sol#832-840) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(_releaseTime > block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/2/0x9ede87077078aee6eaaa96cbee47726a85c7c161.sol#837-839)

TokenTimelock.release (/unique_chucks/2/0x9ede87077078aee6eaaa96cbee47726a85c7c161.sol#842-848) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp >= releaseTime) (/unique_chucks/2/0x9ede87077078aee6eaaa96cbee47726a85c7c161.sol#843)
